name: Surprise Mechanics (Jason Khan)
description:
Are you looking for a game with a compelling storyline, amazing gameplay and immersive graphics? Well, keep looking. This is a gacha game.

Grind through Santa’s deliveries and make some dough. Spend that dough gambling on loot boxes. Collect all the Yogscast items! There are 10 in total. Warning: Some items are rarer than others..

How To Play:

You are a reindeer with a gambling addiction. Use A and D to move.
Earn coins by walking to the big tree and pressing 'E'.
Play the minigame to win coins and spend them on present rolls. 
To buy a present, click on the present button in the top left. 
To open a present, walk up to it.
Enter the lodge with 'E' to view your items. Try to get all 10!

Developed by Jason Khan. 

Environmental art assets by Kenney. Music by Kevin MacLeod.

Made in Unity.
